name: SlimeStack
description:
NOTE: Play the downloadable .exe version if you can, the webGL version has framerate issues!

WASD to move around, Q and E to turn the camera, and space to pop the bottom slime off of the stack. Use these simple controls along with the unique interactions between the different slimes in the game to rescue a black cat being held in the sky by a balloon across a total of 16 levels!

Created by Carlo SanGiovanni and Sylvia Chook over 3-4 weeks for a game programming class at Stony Brook University, Fall 2020 semester.
